name: dev-1
config:
all: 
  vars: 
    stage: dev 
  children: 
    gateway: 
      hosts: 
        dev-1: 
          ansible_host: 192.168.1.101 
      vars: 
        iotHub: 
          enabled: true 
          name: my-iot-hub 
          device: 
            id: MyDevice01 
            key: MyDevice01Key 
        elastic: 
          enabled: true 
          hosts: https://elastic.mycloud.com:443 
          username: dev-1 
          password: SuperSecret1

name: dev-2
config:
all: 
  vars: 
    stage: dev 
  children: 
    gateway: 
      hosts: 
        dev-2: 
          ansible_host: 192.168.1.102 
      vars: 
        iotHub: 
          enabled: true 
          name: my-iot-hub 
          device: 
            id: MyDevice02 
            key: MyDevice02Key 
        elastic: 
          enabled: true 
          hosts: https://elastic.mycloud.com:443 
          username: dev-2 
          password: SuperSecret2
